title: Daphna, The Dreamer
body:
So yea, her name isn't Daphna like we thought... but then who IS Daphna? Riot could've easily just connected that quote to Sol, or some other champion of spatial background. So where does Daphna join into the game or lore?

{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

replies.body: Pretty sure that was just a random quote, kinda like Doran's items. There isn't anything official concerning a Daphna other than that quote AFAIK.
Shame, I really liked the name and title. It would've been so cool.
